Text: how do i install on after effects cs5.5

If you wish to install other Red Giant's products for Adobe CS5.5 before updated installers are available then you must select to install for Adobe CS5 (even if you do not have CS5 installed) and then move the plug-in files from the Adobe CS5 folder to the Adobe CS5.5 folder.

Ok I've gotten this to work for Premiere and After Effects CS5.5

It will say "Installation Failed" but all you have to do is move the plugin folders from:

 /Library/Application Support/Adobe/Common/Plug-ins/CS5/MediaCore

to the CS5.5 folder which is:

/Library/Application Support/Adobe/Common/Plug-ins/CS5.5/MediaCore

Or you can change the installation destiniation while in the install app from the start to the correct cs5.5/mediacore folder

Hope that makes sense...it worked for me
